en.title: What Is Cat Socialization Training? Why the Kitten Stage Is Crucial
en.content:
Cat socialization training is the process of helping kittens become accustomed to people and their environment so they grow into calm, well-adjusted cats.

What Is the Socialization Period?

The cat socialization period is generally considered to be from about 2 to 7 weeks of age. Experiences during this window are more readily accepted even in adulthood, making it a critical time for getting used to people and everyday sounds.

Socialization at Fuluck Cattery

At Fuluck Cattery, we raise kittens in a home environment where they interact with children and other animals for natural socialization. They become accustomed to everyday sounds such as televisions and vacuum cleaners, as well as children's voices, and we also practice bathing, blow-drying, and nail trimming. Thanks to this approach, our kittens can adapt to their new homes with minimal stress after adoption.

What You Can Do After Bringing Your Kitten Home

You can continue socialization in everyday life by introducing your kitten to various people, gradually exposing them to different sounds, and gently handling their body. However, forcing interactions is counterproductive, so always respect your cat's pace.

zh.title: 什么是猫咪社会化训练？幼猫期为何至关重要
zh.content:
猫咪社会化训练是帮助幼猫习惯人类和生活环境，使其成长为性格温和、情绪稳定的猫咪的一种培养方式。

什么是社会化期

猫咪的社会化期一般在出生后2至7周左右。在这个阶段所经历的事物，即使成年后也容易接受，是让猫咪适应人类和日常生活声音的重要时期。

福楽猫舍的社会化训练

福楽猫舍在家庭环境中让幼猫与孩子和其他动物一起生活，实现自然的社会化。幼猫会习惯电视、吸尘器等日常生活声音以及孩子的声音，我们还会进行洗澡、吹风机和剪指甲的练习。通过这些训练，幼猫在被领养后能够顺利适应新环境。

领养后可以做的事情

您可以在日常生活中继续社会化：让猫咪接触各种各样的人、逐渐让它习惯不同的声音、轻柔地触摸它的身体等。但请注意不要强迫，要尊重猫咪自己的节奏。
